data.value:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <configuration> <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.webPages.razor" type="System.Web.WebPages.Razor.Configuration.RazorWebSectionGroup, System.Web.WebPages.Razor, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35"> <section name="host" type="System.Web.WebPages.Razor.Configuration.HostSection, System.Web.WebPages.Razor, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35" requirePermission="false" /> <section name="pages" type="System.Web.WebPages.Razor.Configuration.RazorPagesSection, System.Web.WebPages.Razor, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35" requirePermission="false" /> </sectionGroup> </configSections>
<system.web.webPages.razor> <host factoryType="System.Web.Mvc.MvcWebRazorHostFactory, System.Web.Mvc, Version=5.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35" /> <pages pageBaseType="System.Web.Mvc.WebViewPage"> <namespaces> <add namespace="System.Web.Mvc" /> <add namespace="System.Web.Mvc.Ajax" /> <add namespace="System.Web.Mvc.Html" /> <add namespace="System.Web.Optimization"/> <add namespace="System.Web.Routing" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Web.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Web.Mvc.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.CMS.Web.Mvc.Extensions"/> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.JQuery.Web.Mvc.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Bootstrap.Web.Mvc.Extensions" /> <add namespace="${Namespace}"/> </namespaces> </pages> </system.web.webPages.razor>
<appSettings> <add key="webpages:Enabled" value="false" /> </appSettings>
<system.web> <httpHandlers> <add path="*.cssx" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.cscss" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.vbcss" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.less" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.lessx" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.csless" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.vbless" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.jsx" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.csjs" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.vbjs" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> </httpHandlers> </system.web>
<system.webServer> <handlers> <remove name="BlockViewHandler"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-cssx"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-cscss"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-vbcss"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-less"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-lessx"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-csless"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-vbless"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-jsx"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-csjs"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-vbjs"/> <add name="BlockViewHandler-cssx" path="*.cssx" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-cscss" path="*.cscss" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-vbcss" path="*.vbcss" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-less" path="*.less" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-lessx" path="*.lessx" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-csless" path="*.csless" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-vbless" path="*.vbless" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-jsx" path="*.jsx" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-csjs" path="*.csjs" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-vbjs" path="*.vbjs" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> </handlers> </system.webServer> </configuration>

<?xml version="1.0"?> <configuration> <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.webPages.razor" type="System.Web.WebPages.Razor.Configuration.RazorWebSectionGroup, System.Web.WebPages.Razor, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35"> <section name="host" type="System.Web.WebPages.Razor.Configuration.HostSection, System.Web.WebPages.Razor, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35" requirePermission="false" /> <section name="pages" type="System.Web.WebPages.Razor.Configuration.RazorPagesSection, System.Web.WebPages.Razor, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35" requirePermission="false" /> </sectionGroup> </configSections>
<system.web.webPages.razor> <host factoryType="System.Web.Mvc.MvcWebRazorHostFactory, System.Web.Mvc, Version=5.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35" /> <pages pageBaseType="System.Web.Mvc.WebViewPage"> <namespaces> <add namespace="System.Web.Mvc" /> <add namespace="System.Web.Mvc.Ajax" /> <add namespace="System.Web.Mvc.Html" /> <add namespace="System.Web.Optimization"/> <add namespace="System.Web.Routing" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Web.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Web.Mvc.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.CMS.Web.Mvc.Extensions"/> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.JQuery.Web.Mvc.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Bootstrap.Web.Mvc.Extensions" /> <add namespace="${Namespace}"/> </namespaces> </pages> </system.web.webPages.razor>
<appSettings> <add key="webpages:Enabled" value="false" /> </appSettings>
<system.web> <httpHandlers> <add path="*.cssx" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.cscss" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.vbcss" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.less" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.lessx" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.csless" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.vbless" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.jsx" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.csjs" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add path="*.vbjs" verb="*" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> </httpHandlers> </system.web>
<system.webServer> <handlers> <remove name="BlockViewHandler"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-cssx"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-cscss"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-vbcss"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-less"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-lessx"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-csless"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-vbless"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-jsx"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-csjs"/> <remove name="BlockViewHandler-vbjs"/> <add name="BlockViewHandler-cssx" path="*.cssx" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-cscss" path="*.cscss" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-vbcss" path="*.vbcss" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-less" path="*.less" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-lessx" path="*.lessx" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-csless" path="*.csless" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-vbless" path="*.vbless" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-jsx" path="*.jsx" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-csjs" path="*.csjs" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> <add name="BlockViewHandler-vbjs" path="*.vbjs" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> </handlers> </system.webServer> </configuration>

data.value:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <configuration> <configSections> <sectionGroup name="system.web.webPages.razor" type="System.Web.WebPages.Razor.Configuration.RazorWebSectionGroup, System.Web.WebPages.Razor, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35"> <section name="host" type="System.Web.WebPages.Razor.Configuration.HostSection, System.Web.WebPages.Razor, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35" requirePermission="false" /> <section name="pages" type="System.Web.WebPages.Razor.Configuration.RazorPagesSection, System.Web.WebPages.Razor, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35" requirePermission="false" /> </sectionGroup> </configSections>
<system.web.webPages.razor> <host factoryType="System.Web.Mvc.MvcWebRazorHostFactory, System.Web.Mvc, Version=5.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31BF3856AD364E35" /> <pages pageBaseType="System.Web.Mvc.WebViewPage"> <namespaces> <add namespace="System.Web.Mvc" /> <add namespace="System.Web.Mvc.Ajax" /> <add namespace="System.Web.Mvc.Html" /> <add namespace="System.Web.Optimization"/> <add namespace="System.Web.Routing" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Web.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Web.Mvc.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.CMS.Web.Mvc.Extensions"/> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.JQuery.Web.Mvc.Extensions" /> <add namespace="ISI.Libraries.Bootstrap.Web.Mvc.Extensions" /> <add namespace="${Namespace}"/> </namespaces> </pages> </system.web.webPages.razor>
<appSettings> <add key="webpages:Enabled" value="false" /> </appSettings>
<system.webServer> <handlers> <remove name="BlockViewHandler"/> <add name="BlockViewHandler" path="*" verb="*" preCondition="integratedMode" type="System.Web.HttpNotFoundHandler" /> </handlers> </system.webServer> </configuration>
